display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Container: Healthcare Mobile App
iOS/Android (React Native)
Allows medics and nurses to manage pre-/bedside-/post-round duties.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Container: API Gateway
Kong / NGINX
Single entry point for mobile app; routing, rate limiting, auth enforcement.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Container: Auth Service
Node.js
OIDC/OAuth2, tokens, user sessions, roles.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Container: Patient Service
Java/Spring Boot
Patient profiles, vitals, labs, attachments.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Container: Rounding Service
Python/FastAPI
Task lists, checklists, notes for rounds.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Container: Notification Service
Go
Push notifications and SMS.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
ContainerDb: Core Database
PostgreSQL
Operational data for services.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
External Container: HIS API
External API
Supports limited data access

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
External DB: HIS DB
MS SQLServer
Hospital Information System

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
External: SMS Gateway
Twilio/Nexmo/...
External service for sending SMS messages
